sources.title: Girl In Gold Boots
sources.description: A young woman leaves her job as a waitress and travels to Los Angeles, where she strives to become the top star in the glamorous world of go-go dancing.

metadata.Plot: A young girl, Michele, is persuaded by a disreputable agent-type to leave her job as a waitress and travel to Los Angeles to become a go-go dancer. There, she must compete with the established top star, Joan, and eventually ends up taking her place.
metadata.Writer: Leighton J. Peatman, Art Names, John T. Wilson
metadata.Actors: Jody Daniels, Leslie McRay, Tom Pace
